mapper.select: select EMP_NO as empNo, EMP_ENTT_CODG as empEnttCodg, EMP_MGT_TYPE as empMgtType, PRNT_EMP_NO as prntEmpNo, ASOC_LEGENT_FLAG as asocLegentFlag, EMP_TYPE as empType, EMP_NAME as empName, REG_NAME as regName, LOC_ADMDVS as locAdmdvs, CONER_NAME as conerName, CONER_EMAIL as conerEmail, TEL as tel, FAX_NO as faxNo, TAX_NO as taxNo, ORGCODE as orgcode, REGNO as regno, REGNO_CERT_TYPE as regnoCertType, EMP_ADDR as empAddr, POSCODE as poscode, APRV_ESTA_DEPT as aprvEstaDept, APRV_ESTA_DATE as aprvEstaDate, APRV_ESTA_DOCNO as aprvEstaDocno, PRNT_ADMDVS as prntAdmdvs, INSU_OPTINS as insuOptins, ORG_VALI_STAS as orgValiStas, LEGREP_TEL as legrepTel, LEGREP_NAME as legrepName, LEGREP_CERT_TYPE as legrepCertType, LEGREP_CERTNO as legrepCertno, ORGCODE_ISSU_EMP as orgcodeIssuEmp, VALI_FLAG as valiFlag, RID as rid, CRTE_TIME as crteTime, UPDT_TIME as updtTime, CRTER as crter, CRTER_NAME as crterName, CRTE_OPTINS as crteOptins, OPTER as opter, OPTER_NAME as opterName, OPT_TIME as optTime, OPTINS as optins, POOLAREA as poolarea, VER as ver from insu_emp_info_b where (EMP_NO like CONCAT(concat('%',#{empNo},'%')))

select EMP_INSU_RLTS_ID as empInsuRltsId, EMP_NO as empNo, INSUTYPE as insutype, EMP_INSU_STAS as empInsuStas, EMP_INSU_DATE as empInsuDate, MAX_ACCTPRD as maxAcctprd, CLCT_WAY as clctWay, TAX_BEGN_CLCT_YM as taxBegnClctYm, HI_TYPE as hiType, CLCT_RULE_TYPE_CODG as clctRuleTypeCodg, CLCTSTD_CRTF_RULE_CODG as clctstdCrtfRuleCodg, MEMO as memo, INSU_ORG as insuOrg, POOLAREA as poolarea, OPT_CHNL as optChnl, OPTINS as optins, OPTER as opter, OPTER_NAME as opterName, OPT_TIME as optTime, CRTE_OPTINS as crteOptins, CRTER as crter, CRTER_NAME as crterName, CRTE_TIME as crteTime, UPDT_TIME as updtTime, RID as rid, INSU_EMP_MGT_EID as insuEmpMgtEid from emp_insu_d where EMP_NO = #{empNo}

select pb.PSN_NO as psnNo,pb.PSN_NAME as psnName,pb.CERTNO as certno,pb.GEND as gend,pd.INSUTYPE as insutype,pd.PSN_INSU_STAS as psnInsuStas,pd.PSN_INSU_DATE as psnInsuDate from psn_info_b as pb,psn_insu_d as pd where pb.PSN_NO=pd.PSN_NO and pb.PSN_NO in (select PSN_NO as psnNo from psn_insu_d where EMP_NO=#{empNo} and PSN_INSU_STAS = '1' and INSUTYPE_RETR_FLAG = '0' and PAUS_INSU_DATE is NULL)

select PSN_NO as psnNo,PSN_NAME as psnName,CERTNO as certno,GEND as gend,NATY as naty,SURV_STAS as survStas from psn_info_b where (PSN_NO like CONCAT(concat('%',#{psnNo},'%'))) or (PSN_NAME like CONCAT(concat('%',#{psnName},'%'))) or (CERTNO like CONCAT(concat('%',#{certno},'%')))
select PSN_INSU_STAS as psnInsuStas,PSN_NO as psnNo,PAUS_INSU_DATE as pausInsuDate,PSN_INSU_DATE as psnInsuDate,INSUTYPE as insutype from psn_insu_d where PSN_NO = #{psnNo}
